医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究重点关注针对 COVID-19 变种的有效策略：E7 单克隆抗体研究人员从严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒（SARS-CoV）幸存者中开发出有效的单克隆抗体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/New-study-spotlights- effective-strategy-against-COVID-19-variants-the-E7-monoclonal-antibody.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/New-study-spotlights- effective-strategy-against-COVID-19-variants-the-E7-monoclonal-antibody.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0c81b50-1c30-4cd9-bdf0-1fef56b8abc3 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 11:01:00 -0400 New study spotlights effective strategy against COVID-19 variants: the E7 monoclonal antibody
研究强调了预防抑郁症的代谢目标，这些目标可以通过饮食干预轻松修改研究人员使用基于 UHPLC 和质谱的 Metabolon 平台来识别和表征与抑郁症相关的循环代谢物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Study-highlights-metabolite-targets-for-depression-prevention-that-are-easily-modifying-through-diet-interventions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Study-highlights-metabolite-targets-for-depression-prevention-that-are-easily-modifier-through-diet-interventions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d478db77-33e1-4cf5-93fa-239e09afb748 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 10:32:00 -0400 Study highlights metabolite targets for depression prevention that are easily modifiable through diet interventions
SARS-CoV-2 感染对 T 细胞激活的长期影响：自身免疫性疾病和内皮细胞功能障碍作者探讨了 SARS-CoV-2 对胸腺 (T) 细胞激活的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/The-long-term-effects-of-SARS-CoV-2-infection-on-T-cell-activation-autoimmune-disorders-and-endothelial-细胞功能障碍.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/The-long-term-effects-of-SARS-CoV-2-infection-on-T-cell-activation-autoimmune-disorders-and-endothelial-细胞功能障碍.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=527593dc-e562-4a05-a634-5512fb5f4597 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 10:31:00 -0400 The long-term effects of SARS-CoV-2 infection on T cell activation: autoimmune disorders and endothelial cell dysfunction
新算法表征 SARS-CoV 和 SARS-CoV-2 中的 RNA 基序研究人员开发了一种新算法来分析 RNA 病毒的大型基因组数据集，并将其应用于 SARS-CoV-2 和 SARS-CoV。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Novel-algorithm-characterizes-RNA-motifs-in-SARS-CoV-and-SARS-CoV-2.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Novel-algorithm-characterizes-RNA-motifs-in-SARS-CoV-and-SARS-CoV-2.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47a42c4f-8667-4b18-965e-feec38598077 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 10:18:00 -0400 Novel algorithm characterizes RNA motifs in SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2
氧化应激对女性生育能力的影响科学家回顾现有文献来评估氧化应激与女性不孕症之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/The-effects-of-oxygenative-stress-on-womene28099s-fertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/The-effects-of-oxygenative-stress-on-womene28099s-fertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1495e4f4-ed24-4b64-b9eb-bbea28993465 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 10:10:00 -0400 The effects of oxidative stress on women’s fertility
明确将边缘化人群纳入医学研究可保证每个人的健康和福祉面对性少数群体（SGM）的权利和福祉持续面临的政治威胁，公共卫生和医疗保健机构和从业人员必须明确满足边缘化人群的需求，同时确保具有多重边缘化身份的人得到良好的照顾。根据 JAMA Network Open 的评论，该研究已在研究中得到体现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Explicit-inclusion-of-marginalized-populations-in-medical-research-guarantees-everyones-health-and-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Explicit-inclusion-of-marginalized-populations-in-medical-research-guarantees-everyones-health-and-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9dac0c6-2a76-4db9-b0a8-ecad55effe75 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 10:09:31 -0400 Explicit inclusion of marginalized populations in medical research guarantees everyone's health and well-being
废水监测指标是否与美国各县的 COVID-19 高社区病例和住院率相关？研究旨在了解在家进行 COVID-19 检测是否会影响社区层面发病率的确定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Are-wastewater-surveillance-metrics-linked-with-high-community-case-and-hospitalization-rates-of-COVID-19-across-US-县.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Are-wastewater-surveillance-metrics-linked-with-high-community-case-and-hospitalization-rates-of-COVID-19-across-US-县.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac007dcf-caf5-4f2b-90d9-2b5f53e3a27b Tue, 01 Aug 2023 10:01:00 -0400 Are wastewater surveillance metrics associated with high community case and hospitalization rates of COVID-19 across US counties?
研究 SARS-CoV-2 的神经系统影响：嗅觉丧失和神经侵袭作为独立的现象一组研究人员通过研究 SARS-CoV-2 及其变体通过仓鼠嗅觉通路侵入大脑的能力，研究了它们的神经营养潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Investigating-the-neurological-effects-of-SARS-CoV-2-anosmia-and-neuroinvasion-as-separate-phenomena.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Investigating-the-neurological-effects-of-SARS-CoV-2-anosmia-and-neuroinvasion-as-separate-phenomena.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31666c84-c1e5-4e40-beb1-bf80c029a5b8 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 09:59:00 -0400 Investigating the neurological effects of SARS-CoV-2: anosmia and neuroinvasion as separate phenomena
药物诱导的 GDF15 对癌细胞和心肌细胞调节的分子见解：对精准医疗的影响最近的一项研究阐明了药物诱导的生长分化因子 15 (GDF15) 调节的分子机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Molecular-insights-into-drug-induced-GDF15-regulation-in-cancer-cells-and-cardiomyologies-implications-for- precision-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Molecular-insights-into-drug-induced-GDF15-regulation-in-cancer-cells-and-cardiomyologies-implications-for- precision-medicine.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa7a171a-986a-4a6e-912b-e471545bbb12 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 09:46:00 -0400 Molecular insights into drug-induced GDF15 regulation in cancer cells and cardiomyocytes: implications for precision medicine
IN8bio 在伯明翰 Pepper Place 开设新的癌症研究实验室伯明翰的 Pepper Place 热闹的农贸市场新增了一个引人注目的新成员，并提供著名的食品 -；耗资数百万美元的癌症研究实验室。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/IN8bio-opens-new-cancer-research-lab-in-Birminghams-Pepper-Place.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/IN8bio-opens-new-cancer-research-lab-in-Birminghams-Pepper-Place.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ce117a8-6819-43b4-9ca6-e421e6af504a Tue, 01 Aug 2023 09:45:06 -0400 IN8bio opens new cancer research lab in Birmingham's Pepper Place
